ygData.subject: Other avenues for fishing pole
ygData.msgSnippet: I have another theory.  The group making spyglasses on the Xegony server is not actually making them.  I hypothesis, based upon Luke s ownership of a fishing
ygData.messageBody:
I have another theory. The group making spyglasses on the Xegony server is
not actually making them. I hypothesis, based upon Luke's ownership of a
fishing pole, that the collapsible fishing pole may be a drop from
Meldrath. Has anyone killed and looted him? His guards are around Level
35 or so, but Meldrath is around 26. Perhaps a method to kill him would be
to get a druid or shaman with SOW to cast at the guards, pull them away out
of the cave and let a warrior and wizard finish Meldrath off. Perhaps its
a common drop, maybe a rare drop. Just another theory.
